name: Collated list of docs or process.txt - Why not prometheus:
description: This section provides a link to a Google Document that likely explains the reasons for not using Prometheus, a popular open-source monitoring and alerting system, in a particular context. The document may outline the limitations or drawbacks of Prometheus, or it may suggest alternative solutions that better fit the specific requirements or constraints of the project or organization.
use_cases: Evaluating the suitability of Prometheus for a specific monitoring and alerting scenario
Comparing Prometheus with other monitoring tools or solutions
Understanding the trade-offs and considerations when choosing a monitoring system
capabilities: Explanation of Prometheus limitations or drawbacks
Comparison of Prometheus with alternative monitoring solutions
Analysis of specific requirements or constraints
Evaluation of monitoring tool features and capabilities
